hello.colloboration_msg: Good ideas come from everyone. Work together on your paper

login.code: Enter the verification code from your email and change your password

conceptPaper.notloggedin: In order to be able to use all functions to the full extent, you have to create an account
conceptPaper.pdfdefault: By default your PDF export has an conForm watermark. To have a PDF file without the watermark hit the register button
conceptPaper.docxdefault: By default your DOCX export has an conForm watermark. To have a DOCX file without the watermark hit the register button
conceptPaper.individualize: Here you can individualize your concept papers

inviteTeam.shareText: Here you can share your concept paper with other people and enable them to colloborate with you

joincode.incorrect: The join code you entered is incorrect

howtostart.whatisit: conForm is not a Laravel package
howtostart.webapp: It is a web application that was developed as part of a study project and is intended to replace the conventional filling out, downloading and re-uploading of concept papers
howtostart.createacc: Create an account to benefit from all the features and advantages
howtostart.viewdownload: Review and download your concept papers anytime
howtostart.customize: You can customize your concept papers at any time
